short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all Amazon invoices for the current year across all Amazon domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of navigating through your Amazon order history to find and download your invoices? Amazon Invoice Downloader simplifies the process by allowing you to quickly download invoices for any of your past purchases.

Features:

One-click download of invoices directly from your Amazon account.
Saves time by automatically fetching and organizing your invoices.
Perfect for keeping track of your business expenses or personal purchases.
Works seamlessly with your Amazon order history.
How it works:

Install the extension.
Log into your Amazon account.
Access your orders, choose the period and click "Start Download".
Stay organized and save time with Amazon Invoice Downloader!
